name: Humble Bundle
long_description:
Humble Bundle is a distribution platform selling games, ebooks, software, and other digital content. Since Humble’s founding in 2010, our mission has been to support charity (“Humble”) while providing awesome content to customers at great prices (“Bundle”). We started by offering only game bundles, but have branched out to include an online storefront, a monthly subscription service, a publishing initiative, and lots more. We have raised over $250 million for charity. And we now have over 500,000 subscribers to our Humble Monthly.

Join our award winning team by checking out our careers page at https://jobs.humblebundle.com
one_liner: Pay what you want for awesome games and other content while giving to…

name: Hipset
long_description: The best way for artists to release new music and videos.
one_liner: The best way for artists to release new music and videos.

name: The Ticket Fairy
long_description:
The Ticket Fairy is a next-generation event ticketing, marketing, management, intelligence and revenue acceleration platform, providing event promoters and venue managers the tools necessary to increase attendance levels, social media exposure and consumer engagement, and provide an enhanced experience to their patrons.

The Ticket Fairy is helping large and small events maximise their revenue potential in Australia, New Zealand, India, the United States, and the United Kingdom and Europe, with closed beta trials in East Africa, Singapore, Thailand and Malaysia.
one_liner: Revenue generation for live events

name: Gigwell
long_description:
Gigwell is building the future of event bookings.  

Our platform is trusted by over 100,000 touring artists and venues using Gigwell to streamline the booking process - from managing offers and booking requests to handling electronic contracts and online payments. We have facilitated over $5B in gigs on our platform, in verticals ranging from DJs & Musicians to Public Speakers and Comedians. Leveraging a network of thousands of industry professionals and talent buyers, Gigwell is hyper-tailored to the workflow of a $200B industry that still operates on Excel spreadsheets and Word documents. 

Gigwell is the first integrated, vertical SaaS platform that integrates end-to-end workflow automation for artists, booking, and management agencies. We provide a simple solution for managing artist logistics, collecting and tracking payments electronically, negotiating contracts and talent availabilities, and monitoring revenue goals.

We have been featured in TechCrunch, Billboard, DJ Mag, Mixmag, Hypebot, DJ Times, and Magnetic Magazine, and awarded the most promising startup from Nitey Awards and SF MusicTech’s StartUp Innovators Challenge.
one_liner: Building the Future of Live Event Bookings.

name: Unnyhog
long_description:
We create portals to other dimensions to open people thousands of different lives. 

Unnyhog is a global game development company with 4 released games to the market. Our latest game, UnnyWorld, is a fantasy style MMO game with gesture controls designed to unite mobile and PC users.
one_liner: Video game development company.We are creating unique and…

name: ClassDojo
long_description: ClassDojo's mission is to give every kid an education they love. Our flagship communication app has become the world’s largest network serving kids, reaching over 51 million kids, families and teachers in 180 countries every month, entirely through word of mouth. They use it to share the best moments in a kid's day through pictures, videos, messages, and more. ClassDojo has recognized by Forbes, LinkedIn, Inc and Fast Company, and it is a top 100 Y Combinator company.
one_liner: Communication app for K-8 teachers, kids, and families

name: SkyLights
long_description:
Skylights is a wearable immersive cinematic entertainment for captive audiences.  SkyLights started in the planes, as passenger inflight entertainment.

SkyLights enables patients and passengers to tune out of their environment and escape by enjoying premium cinematic entertainment using VR headsets.

Skylights integrates content licensing deals, secure software, headset hardware, and operations. All four are sold as a subscription service. Skylights is now developing in BtoC.

The company is incorporated in the US.
one_liner: Premium immersive cinematic VR entertainment for captive audiences

name: Mirror AI
long_description: Mirror Emoji Keyboard by Mirror AI is an app that takes a photo of your face and creates you a set of personalized emoji. You get hundreds of them ready to be shared on messengers or social networks.
one_liner: App that turns selfie photos into thousand emoji that look like you…

name: Goosebump
long_description: Goosebump is a messenger app that helps users find live music events online.
one_liner: Find the best electronic music events in a single message.

name: D-ID
all_locations: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
long_description:
D-ID enables creators and developers to generate realistic high-quality AI personas easily and ethically through the use of our platform and APIs, based on deep-learning and AI-powered technology - Enabling Creative Reality™.

D-ID is a Tel Aviv-based Creative Reality™ startup specializing in patented video reenactment technology using AI and deep learning. 
Established in 2017, D-ID created the first facial image de-identification solution to protect images and videos from facial recognition software. 
D-ID's products range from animating still photos to facilitating high-quality video productions and creating viral user experiences.
one_liner: Enable creators and developers to generate realistic AI personas

name: Volley
long_description:
Volley builds the best voice AI games and entertainment experiences for Amazon Alexa, smartphones, and TVs.

Popular Volley voice games include “Song Quiz”, “Jeopardy!”, and “The Price Is Right”.

Our voice apps are used by millions of people every month. We believe voice control will become the main way people access entertainment in their bedrooms, kitchens, living rooms, and cars, and our goal is to become the "Netflix of Voice" for this emerging category of devices.

Volley was founded by Max Child and James Wilsterman in 2016. We're a hybrid remote/in-person company, headquartered in San Francisco.
one_liner: Voice AI games on smart speakers, TVs, and mobile

name: Swipehouse
long_description:
The biggest social network in the world for TikTok celebs. One of the first 5 companies in the US to get the TikTok API. Launched over 400 companies on TikTok in under a year.

Work with Ridge, Hopper, and more. Acquired in 2021.
one_liner: Meet other creators. Get daily matches. Find brand deals.

name: Ixora
one_liner: We create the digital outdoor environment for a movie.

name: DreamCraft Entertainment, Inc.
long_description: DreamCraft enables anyone to create, publish, and monetize video games. The company’s core product is a code-free game creation platform, bundled with high quality art assets. DreamCraft is backed by March Capital, Makers Fund, Tencent Corporation, Y Combinator, and other top investors in the gaming space. The company was founded in 2018 and now has a global team of 20+ people with half remote and half based in Silicon Valley.
one_liner: Platform that allows anyone to create and monetize video games.

name: FameGame
one_liner: Live and interactive TV shows for mobile - starting with American…

name: MoFE
long_description: Museum of Future Experiences (MoFE) is a media tech company that creates, publishes and distributes high end immersive VR experiences.
one_liner: Next generation Disney.

name: Plotdrive
long_description:
Plotdrive is the first continuous production system for narrative — infrastructure that transforms how long-form stories move from imagination to completion. Most books don’t fail for lack of talent; they fail when the workflow collapses somewhere between page 80 and page 300.

Founded by brothers with backgrounds in high-stakes poker, VR, and narrative systems, we built what we couldn’t find: an engine that holds the entire shape of a story while authors work inside it. Writers see 4–5× gains in throughput without losing their voice. Manuscripts that sat untouched for years finally reach the finish line. Authors are using Plotdrive to break decade-long blocks. Publishers are using it to rethink how story pipelines should operate when continuity, context, and editorial craft can finally scale.

The printing press made distribution industrial. We’re making completion industrial — creating the foundational layer for how narrative gets made at scale.
one_liner: AI that remembers your book and helps you finish it

name: Karat Financial
long_description:
We're building the one-stop shop for creator finances.

Your favorite digital creators—the ones you follow every day on YouTube, Instagram, TikTok or Twitch—aren’t just extraordinarily talented personalities and community builders. They’re also businesses. That means they have business needs—managing revenues, expenses, savings, credit, banking. 

We’re building products that help creators spend less time worrying about finances so they can focus on creating.
one_liner: Better financial services for creators

name: Eternal
one_liner: Own the best moments in streaming

name: StartPlaying.Games
long_description: ✨ Hello! ✨ - StartPlaying.Games is the largest marketplace for finding game masters to host digital tabletop games like D&D. Today, more than 40 million people play D&D around the world and sales have grown by double-digit percentages for the last five consecutive years. But still finding people to host and play these games with is challenging. Most solutions involve digging through discord servers, reddit, and specialty forums. We built StartPlaying.Games to solve this problem.
one_liner: Building Communities Through Play

name: Mini Exhibitions
one_liner: Virtual events for remote teams

name: Jemi
long_description: Our mission is to help creators and entrepreneurs grow online. We do this by helping them build a beautiful website and online store with no coding or design background.
one_liner: Jemi helps people build beautiful websites and stores.

name: Tappity
long_description: Tappity is building the world’s largest library of interactive lessons for kids—starting with science! Find every science topic kids love in one place taught by the world's most entertaining instructors.
one_liner: World's largest library of interactive lessons for kids

name: Hyper Online
long_description:
Hyper is an early stage startup with a mission to build the largest avatar platform in the world. We're starting by targeting consumer use-cases, and our first one is VTubing: an emerging type of content where creators use computer-vision and motion capture to pilot 3D avatars as content creation tools.

Avatar content (also known as VTubing) has broken into the multi-billion-view-per-month category on places like Twitch and YouTube. This has given a new group of people the power to tell stories and present themselves on their own terms online while also protecting their IRL identities.  Our goal is to build the largest platform tools for this new movement. We're now  the #1 US VTubing app on iOS. 

We also recently announced our seed funding: we're backed by Amazon, Two Sigma Ventures, MakersFund, YCombinator, and other great investors.

App Store: https://hyper.online/download
TechCrunch: https://techcrunch.com/2023/06/12/hyper-raises-3-6m-from-amazon-and-more-for-its-iphone-based-vtuber-friendly-avatar-platform/
one_liner: Social avatar platform for VTubers

name: Together Video Chat
all_locations: Barcelona, CT, Spain; CT, Spain; Remote
long_description: Together transforms the way kids and grown ups participate in a video call by providing educational activities, books and interactive games that can be played while video chatting.
one_liner: Interactive video chat made for kids and families

name: Hellosaurus
long_description:
[Hellosaurus](http://www.hellosaurus.com) is an interactive video platform for kids filled with stories they can actually play instead of just watch. Top kids media creators and popular YouTube stars are already making content for our platform and transforming screen time into an active and fun experience. 

Hellosaurus is developing software tools for creators of high-quality kids programming to make truly participatory shows and a single distribution platform to share these creations with families everywhere. Experts in early childhood education have long stressed the importance of play for healthy cognitive and social development, and Hellosaurus supports this by empowering content creators to build enriching, interactive shows that engage kids as active participants rather than passive viewers.
one_liner: Interactive video platform for kids

name: Gigs Live
long_description: We are the Substack for millions of artists, musicians, indie producers, extreme sports athletes and video production companies. With us, creators have the freedom to choose flexible monetization plans such as PPV, micro-subscriptions, merch drops and many more.   Creators choose us because our platform is available in 4K on Apple TV, Roku, Amazon Fire, Gaming consoles and more. Creators also get audience analytics and marketing to retain and acquire their audience. So take care of marketing, distribution and monetization for creators so they can focus on their craft and we take care of the rest.
one_liner: Video publishing and monetization platform for creators and artists

name: Redbean
one_liner: Make games and stories with AI

name: BlackOakTV
long_description: BlackOakTV is a subscription video platform hyper-serving black viewers and creators. We make it easy for black viewers to find, watch and engage with the content and creators that most reflect their lives and experiences.
one_liner: A video subscription platform serving black viewers and creators.

name: Omoi (formerly Azuki)
long_description: Omoi (formerly Azuki) is Netflix-style Japanese comic subscription service where users can subscribe for $4.99 a month to unlock access to all the manga on the service. Free users have access to select chapters with ads.
one_liner: Japanese comic subscription service

name: Argo
long_description: A platform for brands and creator to monetize their video entertainment more efficiently, build an engaged community and reward their fans.
one_liner: A social streaming platform powered by creators and fans

name: Durioo
long_description:
We create and license high quality Islamic cartoons and shows that kids watch on our subscription app.

We are the right team to do this because we previously created an Islamic cartoon with more than 3 billion views on YouTube.

All parents want their kids to grow up with values and virtues close to them. The same goes for Muslim parents - but the reality is - they are struggling to get high quality Islamic content for their kids.

We are addressing an underserved market of 70 million Muslim families with internet access globally.
one_liner: Streaming Platform for Muslim Children

name: Housewarming
long_description:
Housewarming is social media and AI designed to bring you closer to your friends, not replace them or keep you isolated in an algorithm.

We've been building mega-viral consumer AI experiences since 2020. From the music discovery app Discz (1.5M users) to creative expression with Verse & Internet Bedroom (0-10 million users in 30 days, one of the fastest growing products of all-time) we like building at the frontier of technology in ways consumer truly love.

Housewarming is our latest and most delightful product ever. Check it out, share moments with your friends, and let us know what you think :)
one_liner: Share casual moments with the people you care about

name: The Ankler
long_description: The Ankler is subscription news for the entertainment industry so good that everyone from CEOs to creators pay to consume it every day.
one_liner: Subscription entertainment news

name: Cinapse
long_description:
Cinapse is reimagining the production schedule: the foundation of every film and TV project. We’re building the OS of Hollywood, starting with the tool that filmmakers use every day.

Besides the script, nothing is more foundational to filmmaking. There’s no accurate budget without a schedule. No execution plan without one. The schedule is the map that takes us from idea to image.

Cinapse helps filmmakers draw that map better, faster, and together.
one_liner: The Operating System of Hollywood

name: Finnix
long_description: Finnix is a financial technology solutions provider for Indonesian creative businesses. We provide loans and financial management tools for event organizers, agencies, concert promoters, and others.
one_liner: Financial technology solutions for Indonesian creative businesses

name: Hype
long_description:
Trade memecoins, crypto and send crypto to your friends
Download Hype here: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/hype-trade-memes/id6477802830
one_liner: Trade memecoins & crypto

name: Backdrop
long_description: We are an expense management and payments platform for the entertainment industry, which still rely on spreadsheets and paper receipts to manage the $650B+ they spend each year.
one_liner: Vertical SaaS for $650B+ Film, TV, Music & Event Production Industry

name: Storyboarder
long_description:
Storyboarder is a tool and a platform for anyone to create, share, and sell webcomics.


In East Asia, the webcomic (or digital manga) industry is an $12B market and rapidly growing to the rest of the world. Webtoon, the largest company in the space, generates $100M / month in revenue. However, their addressable market is limited by their content creators, who need know how to draw. Readers are desperate for a greater variety of stories in webcomics.


Through years of working with filmmakers, we’ve built extremely easy to use storyboarding software  that has 700K users. We’re democratizing visual storytelling to everyone. We’re working on the next generation that, through advances in video game interfaces, ubiquitous 3D compute, and AI, will allow anyone to easily create scenes, pose characters, to create webcomics. 


Storyboarder is backed by Y Combinator (W23), David Karp (Tumblr Founder), Andrew Kortina (Venmo Founder), and other product focused investors.
one_liner: Tool and platform to create and sell webcomics

name: Shortbread
long_description: Shortbread app is Netflix for romance comics built by a team of women writers, artists and engineers. We work with bestselling authors on Kindle and #BookTok to turn their romance fictions into comics. Our content specialize in viral romance fiction tropes such as mafia and dark romance. The comics are free to read with options to buy a subscription.
one_liner: Read romance comics.

name: Kino AI
long_description: Kino automatically organizes footage to make video editing faster and more enjoyable. Kino saves hours every day for all types of video creation, from Youtube content to Hollywood blockbusters.
one_liner: Kino automatically organizes footage to make video editing faster.

name: Glade
long_description: Glade is helping everyone build games with AI. GladeCore powers over 50 studios and developers with local AI NPCs that include TTS, STT, emotional tuning, and RAG. GladeKit is Cursor for Games - an AI agent that lives directly in your game engine and builds games for you.
one_liner: Build games at the speed of thought

name: Eggnog
long_description:
Eggnog is the Youtube for AI-generated content. The initial product is the only AI video platform on the market that generates consistent characters. The vision is to have the largest library of remixable characters and sets for users to collaboratively build and watch AI-generated content. Eggnog launched a week ago, and videos made on the platform are getting 100k views on Twitter.

Team: Sam (BS, Applied Math from Harvard) was a data scientist at Facebook and Quora working on newsfeed and creator monetization. Jitesh (BS, MEng from MIT CS) was a consultant at McKinsey and PM at Flexport.
one_liner: Youtube for AI-generated content

name: HeartByte
long_description: Storio is a content platform where creators can create original fiction or derivative works based on other fictional worlds. Creators write fictions 10 times faster on Storio. It's a place for community to fully indulge in the fictional world that they wish they were in.
one_liner: GenAI Interactive story. Creator write fictions 10x faster.

name: CrowdVolt
long_description: CrowdVolt is rebuilding the infrastructure for live events, starting with an automated marketplace for raves and electronic dance music.
one_liner: The integration layer for live events infrastructure

name: CreativeMode
long_description: Lovable for Minecraft Mods. Empowering over 100,000 players to become creators.
one_liner: Lovable for Minecraft mods

name: DreamRP
long_description:
AI entertainment feels like slop because companies bet on technology instead of people.

Companies chase tech because it usually lets them win. But what fans love has never been about the tech.

A fan doesn’t fill their apartment with posters because of the lens a movie was shot on. They do it because of the mind behind the camera.

AI is a power-up. In the wrong hands, more and more of what you see becomes sludge. In the right ones, the good stuff wins.

DreamRP builds for creatives, from indie artists to global stars, because they’ve always been the real reason fans love what they love.

If you get it, message me why.
one_liner: Tech and platforms for human creators and the entertainment industry

name: Swerve
one_liner: Chat with AI Characters

name: The Interface
long_description: The Interface enables anyone to create, interact, and share on the fly — from TV shows to games to movies. Drawing on deep expertise in realtime compute and simulation, we combine multimodal AI with the best of 3D simulation and modelling techniques, to deliver real-time experiences that are alive, interactive, and emergent.
one_liner: The foundations for AI-native media

name: Mixy
long_description:
Live out your DJ dreams with Mixy, the mind-blowing music app that lets you mash-up any song in seconds.

⁕ Add your songs
⁕ Instantly blend vocals and beats
⁕ Play and share your mashup anywhere

There’s no limit to your imagination!

⁕ Launched to #1 in Music on June 19th
⁕ 1.5M users in 3 months
⁕ 15M mashups made and growing
one_liner: Make mashups without knowing how to DJ

name: Koyal
long_description:
Koyal is an Agentic AI Filmmaking Platform that allows you to seamlessly convert script or audio into personalized, visually compelling stories. We’re a team from Carnegie Mellon, MIT and Meta, with experience in AI video generation.

https://koyal.ai builds directly upon our published research at the AI conference NeurIPS in December. We’ve been covered in the international press for our patented secure personalization protocol CHARCHA: the genAI captcha.

Announcement: https://x.com/meh_agarwal/status/1965866965425348687
Demo: https://x.com/meh_agarwal/status/1965137062119752099


We currently have paid pilots with the biggest global music labels, podcasts and production houses, and just launched our public beta at beta.koyal.ai

We recently concluded a pilot with Universal Music and T-Series (world’s largest music label) alongside Bollywood production houses like Maddock Entertainment, and Collective Artists Network! As part of that, we launched 5 music videos for Grammy and Oscar winning artists like A R Rahman, Ricky Kej and Shankar Mahadevan all crossing 1.5 million views!

We've recently built SOTA capabilities in (i) multilingual script to audio to video, (ii) Agentic lip-sync with dynamic movement & (iii) Multi-character consistency.
one_liner: Agentic AI Filmmaking Platform

name: Martini
long_description:
Martini is a collaborative, AI-native platform for professional filmmaking in the era of generative media.
By integrating the best generative models into professional workflows, we enable world-class creatives to harness generative AI as a legitimate medium for film.
one_liner: Collaborative AI-native filmmaking for professionals
